name: dx-datatable-app
description: * Use any public API or make own to load JSON with 5000+ records; * Use vanilla js or Vue.js framework to implement data representation table (at least 3 columns); * Click on any column header it should sort the table by a particular column, next click should reverse order; * Add pagination. Leave the possibility to see all records ant one; * Output last clicked table cell data somewhere on the screen outside table. Change the color of last clicked row; * Have a strong concern about performance; * Commit source to a public repository (GitHub) and send the link; * Would be great to have a live demo online.
